snippet.title: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 - Official Saints and Sinners Trailer
snippet.description:
Here’s the new Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 trailer for the upcoming action RPG sequel. Returning to the world of 15th Century Bohemia (Central Europe), Kingdom Come: Deliverance II picks up where its predecessor left off. Step into the shoes of Henry, a young man on a quest to avenge his murdered parents and explore a beautiful yet brutal Medieval open-world set amid the chaos of a civil war.

Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 will be released in 2024 on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

#IGN #Gaming #KingdomComeDeliverance
